0.5.0-alpha.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.0 Changelog:**
APLC Mod:
- Rewrote the entire mod, allowing for the following benefits:
  - Improved Item and Location handling, making it significantly easier for me to add new items and locations
  - Improved readability and flexibility, so its easier for people to contribute if they want to add their own things to the mod
  - No more needing new APworlds every time the mod updates, from now on new mod updates will support any APworld 0.4.2 and above, meaning you can get new features and bugfixes without having to restart your multiworlds(but this update will wipe your progress towards quota checks and moon checks as the save system for those changed, meaning you will have to re get those checks to make progress)
- Fixed a bug where infinite traps would trigger if you got a trap, only fixing if you quit and reentered the game
- Added the /disconnect command, which disconnects you from the APworld
- Fixed a bug where every chat message was sent to the AP servers once for each player, leading to spamming
- Fixed a bug where the "Player X has landed the ship" messages would send to the AP servers, also leading to spamming and unwanted messages

APworld:
- Fixed a logical bug where if you started on experimentation playing solo, a reachable stamina bar wasn't guaranteed leading to possible softlocks(experimentation requires jumping to return to the ship after leaving the facility)
- Fixed a bug where the moon you started with would still be shuffled into the item pool, leading to an essentially nothing item
0.5.0-alpha.title: 0.5.0-alpha

0.5.11-alpha.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.11 changelog:**
apworld:
- Added three new locations: Quota 25%, Quota 50%, and Quota 75%. They are guarenteed to have the following items: Completed 25% Quota, Completed 50% Quota, and Completed 75% Quota. The purpose of these is to space out the quota checks over four spheres so that it doesn't expect you to get quota check 20 right when quota checks are in logic.
- Added two new yaml options:
  - exclude_hive: Prevents the Bee Hive location from having any progression or useful items
  - exclude_shotgun: Prevents the double-barrel location from having any progression or useful items
- slightly reworked the way gold bar works, now it is technically in logic once you receive March but it cannot have a progression or useful item, this change was made to pass the all locations reachable test

mod:
- Added support for the Quota 25%, Quota 50%, and Quota 75% locations.

Github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/0.5.11-alpha
Thunderstore page: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
0.5.11-alpha.title: 0.5.11-alpha

0.5.13-alpha.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.13**
Mod:
- Added company building randomization(sorry)
- Added terminal randomization(sorry again)

apworld:
- Fixed a bug that expected you to be able to find every monster on every moon
- Added yaml settings for terminal and company building randomization

As usual, if you find any bugs or issues, or you have any cool suggestions, let me know.

Github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/tag/0.5.13-alpha
Thunderstore mod: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
0.5.13-alpha.title: 0.5.13-alpha

0.5.15-beta.description:
apworld should behave identically, but should generate significantly faster. This is due to me redoing the logic, moving it all into regions from locations.
I did this for a few reasons:
- As mentioned before, this makes generation significantly faster(from multiple seconds to less than a quarter of a second on max settings from my limited testing)
- This also makes it easier for me to add new locations, or add alternate harder or easier logic to existing locations.
- Finally, it reduces the chance of any logic bugs, because having all the logic for each location on the location itself instead of inherited makes the lambdas really large and really hard to read and debug.
0.5.15-beta.title: 0.5.15-beta

0.5.16-beta.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.16**
apworld:
- moved some code to generate_early since there was a slight chance it would break
- added credit hunt(mcguffin hunt) game mode
- added 2 new related yaml settings and a new option for the game_mode option

mod:
- added new tracker to the terminal to track credit hunt progress when in credit hunt mode(on the moons screen)
- added credit hunt mode

roadmap:
0.6.0:
- Terminal commands
  - hints: shows all received hints
  - tracker: shows all reachable checks
  - scrap: shows all collected and yet to be collected scrap so that you know what to look for
- apworld that meets all the style requirements for archipelago
- logic difficulty settings
  - easy: very forgivable logic, good for beginners of the game
  - medium: close to current logic
  - hard: minimum possible logic
- also, per moon logic, since experimentation is impossible without stamina but you shouldn't need too much more to get a B or higher, while bigger moons like titan need almost all your stamina and inventory slots for the same success.

future:
- AP logo shaped trophy case for trophy mode(trying to figure out thunderkit for this but its been a struggle)
- Trophy case for AP chests in collectathon mode

not needed but would be cool if I could figure it out:
- Custom scrap support for scrapsanity
- Custom moon support
- Custom monster support

If anyone has any ideas for anything that I should add to this list, please tell me, i'm reaching the end of my ideas for features.

mod page: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/tag/0.5.16-beta
0.5.16-beta.title: 0.5.16-beta

0.5.17-beta.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.17 Changelog**

- Added a new option to modify scrap spawn rates to make scrapsanity easier
  - Added a yaml option called modify_scrap_spawns, default is true
  - Added new logic for when modify_scrap_spawns is true to handle the changed scrap spawns
  - When modify_scrap_spawns is true, every moon has five exclusive scrap for only that moon and seven scrap that can spawn on any moon, along with special scrap like the hive, apparatus, and shotgun which keep their spawn rates and logic from before. All scrap has the same spawn weight.
    - Experimentation: V-type engine, Homemade flashbang, Dust pan, Steering wheel, Yield sign, Apparatus, Hive
    - Assurance: Big bolt, Bottles, Cookie mold pan, Red soda, Stop sign, Apparatus, Hive
    - Vow: Egg beater, Chemical jug, Flask, Brush, Rubber Ducky, Apparatus, Hive
    - Offense: Metal sheet, Gift, Magnifying glass, Remote, Toy robot, Apparatus
    - March:  Whoopie cushion, Airhorn, Clown horn, Gold bar, Toy cube, Apparatus, Hive
    - Rend: Painting, Ring, Fancy lamp, Candy, Bell, Shotgun
    - Dine: Tragedy, Jar of pickles, Cash register, Mug, Hairdryer, Shotgun
    - Titan: Comedy, Golden cup, Old phone, Perfume bottle, Pill bottle, Apparatus, Shotgun
    - Common: Large axle, Laser pointer, Magic 7 ball, Plastic fish, Tea kettle, Teeth, Toothpaste

Thunderstore page: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
Github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/tag/0.5.17-beta
0.5.17-beta.title: 0.5.17-beta

0.5.2-alpha.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.2 Changelog:**
APLC Mod:
- Added a few new items:
  - Birthday Gift: A random shop item is delivered by the dropship
  - Clone Scrap: A random scrap item in the ship is cloned
  - Less Time: The quota deadline shortens by one day. If it would reduce the deadline to 0, it instead reduces the next quota's deadline
  - More Time: Opposite of less time
  - Strength Training: Increases move speed and decreases stamina use slightly, making heavy items less punishing
- (maybe?) fixed a bug where shop items would rarely not count as received

APWorld:
- Added a few new YAML settings:
  - Strength Training Weight: adjusts the weight of strength training items in the pool
  - Extra Day Weight: adjusts the weight of More Time items in the pool
  - Lose a Day Weight: adjusts the weight of Less Time items in the pool
  - Scrap Cloning Weight: adjusts the weight of scrap duplication items in the pool
  - Birthday Gift Weight: adjusts the weight of birthday gift items in the pool
- The bug where the moon you started with is shuffled into the pool wasn't fixed in the last update but should be fixed now.
0.5.2-alpha.title: 0.5.2-alpha

0.5.5-alpha.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.5 Changelog:**

APLC Mod:
- Added scrapsanity mode
- Fixed compatibility with LethalExpansionCore and (hopefully) LethalExpansion
- Fixed bug where weight wouldn't reset to 0 when setting things down on shelves
- Fixed bug where strength training could make you have negative weight
- Fixed bug where the collectathon victory condition wasn't properly checked
- (untested) Fixed bug where deathlink wouldn't kill you
- Added the ability for there to be different target grades for the easy, medium, and hard moons
- Fixed bug where moon prices weren't correct

apworld:
- Added scrapsanity mode
- Added four new yaml settings that allow you to adjust the target grade seperately for easy, medium, and hard moons
- Added a yaml setting to enable/disable scrapsanity

Not all scrap have been tested with scrapsanity, so let me know if anything doesn't work. My plan for the next major update is to focus on adding some useful terminal commands. I don't think I'll move the connect command to the terminal because of the limited space and character set, but if enough people want me to I'll work on it.

Github release: https://github.com/Awesomeness278/APLC/releases/latest
Thunderstore mod: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
0.5.5-alpha.title: 0.5.5-alpha

0.5.7-alpha.description:
**APLC Version 0.5.7 Changelog**
APLC Mod:
- Fixed a bug where whoopie cushions and shotguns didn't work in scrapsanity
- Fixed a bug where the split moon grades didn't work
- Added progressive flashlights

apworld:
- Added progressive flashlights

apworlds down to 0.4.8 are compatible with the 0.5.7 mod, so this update won't break anything by updating(unless you update from pre 0.5.0 to post 0.5.0). If you find any more bugs, let me know. Sorry it took so long for this update to release.

Thunderstore mod: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
Github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/tag/0.5.7-alpha
0.5.7-alpha.title: 0.5.7-alpha

0.6.0-beta.description:
**APLC 0.6.0**
It's finally here! Expect bugs since this is a new major update, and **updating your mod from pre 0.6.0 to post 0.6.0 _might_ work but I'd caution against it**.
apworld updates:
 - Added two new settings: min_monster_chance and min_scrap_chance. Bestiary entries and scrapsanity checks will now only be in logic if their spawn chance on any reachable moons is greater than this probability. If a scrap or monster is never accessible, it is guaranteed to have a filler item or trap.
 - Increased maximum collectathon scrap goal to 99
 - Added the ability to add custom content to the randomizer(check the github readme for more info)
 - starting_moon is now a string input, and all custom moons will work too. Entering abbreviations like exp, off, mar, or art now also works.
 - modify_scrap_spawns is now randomly shuffled based on your seed
 - added new v50 content
 - exclude_shotgun now also excludes the Knife
 
 mod updates:
  - fixed bug with the mod not realizing it was connected when it autoconnected you
  - the mod now disconnects from the multiworld after leaving a save file
  - updated tracker command to use the new settings
  - added GetGameLogicString() function for adding custom content(check the github readme for more info)
  - fixed some scattered bugs
  - added new v50 content
  - make sure you are on the same LC version and have the same custom content mods as the apworld you generated from, otherwise there might be some weird behavior
 
Github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/0.6.0-beta
Thunderstore release: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
0.6.0-beta.title: 0.6.0-beta

0.6.13-beta.description:
**APLC 0.6.13**
Mod:
- fixed bug where players other than the host wouldn't automatically join the multiworld
- fixed bug where AP chat only showed for the host
- fixed bug where items would sometimes unlock but still cost an insane price
- added the ability to search for scrap with the scrap command, now it works with both scrap and moons

apworld:
- fixed bug where starting_moon didn't work
- added new v64 content
- the default for modify_scrap_spawns is now false

future plans:
- fix the quota check exploit(was a harder issue to track down than initially thought)
- fix some custom moons not working
- allow the playing of custom LC apworlds with each other and the vanilla one
- use the new networking process to have only the host connect to the AP server and relay all the info to the other players instead of every player connecting to the AP server
- fix rare bug where datastorage can timeout
- add the ability to save checks locally when not connected and send them when connected again later for offline play/spotty internet

github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/0.6.13-beta
thunderstore release: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/

0.7.0-beta.description:
# APLC Version 0.7.0
**Because of a change to item names for more future proofing and to fix some custom content bugs, as well as some back end changes to fix some other bugs, this apworld and mod WILL NOT work with versions < 0.7.0.**

## Changelog
- Fixed a ton of bugs
  - Multiplayer will no longer break after leaving/rejoining a save
  - Days left will no longer infinitely go up
  - Dying from a death link will no longer cause another one
  - AP Apparatus - Custom should now give out the correct check when brought back to the ship
  - Vain Shroud has been removed
  - One word custom moons will no longer have a blank name
  - Custom and new scrap should now send the right check
- Added the config terminal command(can be used even when not connected to the multiworld!)
  - When used with no arguments, will show the current value of all the config options, as well as possible values
  - Can be used with two arguments, the setting name and the value.
    - sendapchat - will enable/disable the sending of LC chat messages to archipelago
    - recapchat - will enable/disable the printing of archipelago messages in the LC chat
    - maxchat - will change the maximum amount of characters a single chat message can use
    - recfiller - the big one, will enable/disable filler items automatically activating
- Added the apfiller terminal command
  - Can be used without arguments to show how many of each filler item you've received, as well as how many are queued up.
  - If recfiller is false, you can use apfiller with one argument to activate a queued filler item
- Added a way to allow you to use multiple custom content lethal company worlds in the same multiworld, explained further in the readme
- Renamed all moons to include their number, commands and yaml options that use moon names won't need to change because they look to see if what you entered is contained in any moon name. Since exp is contained in 41 Experimentation, exp would be all you need to enter.

### Because so much changed, I expect there to be some bugs that slipped through the cracks. If you notice any, please tell me, and I will fix them as fast as I can.

As always, the mod will be available from thunderstore in about 15 minutes

Thunderstore release: https://thunderstore.io/c/lethal-company/p/APLC/APLC/
Github release: https://github.com/T0r1nn/APLC/releases/tag/0.7.0-beta
0.7.0-beta.title: 0.7.0-beta

v0.7.1-beta.description: Fixed a few bugs related to scrapsanity and trophies.
v0.7.1-beta.title: v0.7.1-beta

v0.7.5-betar2.description:
Apworld Changes:
* v70 logs, bestiary entry, and item added to logic
* Knife location is now Kitchen knife to fix issues with the check not counting
* scrap and monsters below the min chance now have logical connections (except scrap that don't spawn at all)

Mod Changes:
* custom ap apparatuses now include the moon's name in the scan node text
* the two logs that got name changes in v70 now correctly count as checks
* fixed an issue where the Adamance apparatus name didn't match the scrap check (apparently there are two apparatuses?)
* fixed (most) custom moons with nonstandard names costing money
* the game *should* no longer crash on close when the user enters invalid connection info
v0.7.5-betar2.title: v0.7.5-beta

v0.7.6-beta.description:
Mod:
* actually made LLL a dependency
* hid some unnecessary information from user logs
* plugin version is now displayed when the plugin loads
* applied a temporary fix for NREs when using the scrap and tracker terminal commands
* custom monsters should no longer have NaN rarity
* custom ap apparatuses now have the correct chance for their corresponding moons
* fixed incorrect logic string output in regions that use commas in place of decimal points
* fixed custom ap apparatuses not sending checks
* moon difficulty is now calculated correctly (no more "Medium" on all custom moons)
* custom ap apparatuses now only grant scrap checks if they are obtained from the current moon
* fixed the cruiser and other vehicles not showing up in the store

Apworld:
* scrap and monsters with a weight of 0 on all moons no longer have locations
* Sapsucker Egg can ACTUALLY be excluded now

Other:
* documentation changes
v0.7.6-beta.title: v0.7.6-beta

v0.7.7-beta.description:
Mod:
* apchests no longer get deleted when they count toward the collectathon goal
* removed unnecessary chat dupe fix
* reduced Dine scrap when using modify_scrap_spawns
* routing to Gordion is now correctly blocked when the company building is randomized and not yet received
* enemy traps work again and now spawn the enemy at a random node
* added LethalLevelLoaderUpdated as a dependency until LLL gets an update for v73
Apworld:
* clarified the amount of trophies required to complete trophy mode
* adjusted scrap logic to match v73
* removed unnecessary apparatus logic that was causing issues
v0.7.7-beta.title: v0.7.7-beta

v0.7.9-beta.description:
Mod: 
* removed LLLU as it is no longer needed
* logic now consistently refers to "Company" as "71 Gordion"
* fixed an issue where ap chests were counted multiple times in multiplayer
* fixed log entries not showing up in the tracker
* speculative fix for deathlink sometimes not killing a player (it is also controlled by the host now)
* Replaced some unnecessary try-catch blocks with more appropriate error checking. This is only phase 1.
* scrap inside the company cruiser now gets checked off properly
* added a few unit tests for easier development
* added a license for the Archipelago library to the Thunderstore package
* added comments to document the function of classes and some methods for future contributors
* Moved most config options to a config file so they will carry across saves, and added some new config options. Some of these will sync with the host config.
* the moon page in the terminal always shows all moons, but indicates which ones are locked
* added compatability with DawnLib and set up for it to potentially replace LLL
* WE now have a license, too!
* Failing quota now instantly starts you on your starting moon rather than routing to experimentation first
* 'Filler triggers instantly' config option is now off by default
* Players are now notified of unspent filler items when landing at the company building

Apworld:
* fixed an issue with monsters that have 0 weight on all moons 
* added a manifest

Mod version 0.7.9 WILL work with apworld versions 0.7.7 AND 0.7.9
v0.7.9-beta.title: v0.7.9-beta
